entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain with a few thunderstorms ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
